name: Scape 2 Survive
description:
Scape 2 Survive Announcement Trailer

"Scape 2 Survive" consists in a stategy game where the goal is to scape the prison.

A third person game where you are a russian spy who got sent to prison by stolen state secrets and sentenced by death. To avoid that, you have to make a plan, an easy but slow plan, or one more difficult but fastest. Make your choice, change your clothes, talk to other inmates, complete quests, trade and steal items, check your inventory, dig as fast as you can and prevent being detected by the guards. Gather everything you need in order to avoid what no one ever did.

Are you ready to fight for your own freedom? Now it's time to make a plan and "Scape 2 Survive".
